title: Smart Data Models - PssSH
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Model for Siemens 'H infinity' power system stabilizer with generator electrical power input.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be PssSH

k.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Main gain (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

k0.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain 0 (K0).  Typical Value = 0.012. Default: 0.0

k1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain 1 (K1).  Typical Value = 0.488. Default: 0.0

k2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain 2 (K2).  Typical Value = 0.064. Default: 0.0

k3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain 3 (K3).  Typical Value = 0.224. Default: 0.0

k4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Gain 4 (K4).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

t1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant 1 (T1).  Typical Value = 0.076. Default: 0

t2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant 2 (T2).  Typical Value = 0.086. Default: 0

t3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant 3 (T3).   Typical Value = 1.068. Default: 0

t4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant 4 (T4).  Typical Value = 1.913. Default: 0

td.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Input time constant (Td).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

vsmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Output maximum limit (Vsmax).  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0

vsmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Output minimum limit (Vsmin).  Typical Value = -0.1. Default: 0.0
